products.short_description_en: High‑purity feedstock supporting acetylene generation and downstream specialty syntheses.
products.short_description_zh: 高纯度原料，支持乙炔制备与下游特种合成。
products.full_description_en: Calcium carbide is used primarily for the generation of acetylene gas and as a reducing agent in steelmaking. Available in granulated, technical grade with ≥75% gas-volumetric purity.
products.full_description_zh: 电石主要用于生成乙炔气体，并作为炼钢中的还原剂。颗粒状工业级，纯度≥75%（气体体积法）。
applications_en: Acetylene gas generation for welding and cutting
applications_zh: 焊接和切割用乙炔气体生成
products.storage_en: Store in a cool, dry, well-ventilated area away from moisture. Keep container tightly closed.
products.storage_zh: 存放在阴凉、干燥、通风良好的地方，远离潮湿。保持容器密闭。
products.safety_notes_en: Reacts violently with water to produce flammable acetylene gas. Handle with care. Use appropriate PPE.
products.safety_notes_zh: 与水剧烈反应产生易燃乙炔气体。小心操作。使用适当的个人防护装备。

products.short_description_en: A multifunctional agrochemical and chemical intermediate, enabling soil improvement, nitrogen fertilization, and specialty NCN syntheses.
products.short_description_zh: 多功能农用化学品和化学中间体，可用于土壤改良、氮肥施用和特种NCN合成。
products.full_description_en: Calcium cyanamide is a versatile agricultural chemical used as a nitrogen fertilizer and soil improver. It also serves as an important intermediate in the production of various cyanamide derivatives.
products.full_description_zh: 氰氨化钙是一种多用途农业化学品，用作氮肥和土壤改良剂。它也是生产各种氰胺衍生物的重要中间体。

products.short_description_en: Cyanamide & Dicyandiamide for controlled reactivity and high‑performance curing systems.
products.short_description_zh: 氰胺与双氰胺，具备可控反应性与高性能固化方案。

products.short_description_en: Creatine Monohydrate & Guanidinoacetic Acid for nutrition and functional performance.
products.short_description_zh: 肌酸一水合物与胍基乙酸，服务于营养与功能性应用。

products.short_description_en: Thiourea & Guanidine Nitrate as dependable intermediates for advanced syntheses.
products.short_description_zh: 硫脲与硝酸胍，可靠的高级合成中间体。
